title: How To Share AirTags With Another Person On iPhone or iPad?
text: Launch the Find My app on your iPhone or iPad device and select Items. Choose the AirTag or item you wish to share, then tap on Share This AirTag (or Share This Item) and select Add Person. (Image Credit: Freepik) Enter the Apple ID of the individual you wish to include. (Image Credit: Freepik) To include more people, tap the Add button. (Image Credit: Freepik) Select the name of the person you want to share with, then choose their Apple ID. (Image Credit: Freepik) Repeat steps 3 and 4 for each additional person you want to add. (Image Credit: Freepik) Once you've finished adding recipients, tap Share located in the top-right corner.
